textBeforeTable: Merrimac Market Comparison The average home price in Merrimac is $456,676, which is 32.6% higher than the average sold price in Merrimac ($344,357) . The average home price per square foot in Merrimac is $249 and about 2% of all homes in Merrimac sold in the last 6 months. For Merrimac home values, real estate prices, and city market trends, research the 2,143 property records or search our 53 recently sold or 38 homes for sale listings. The listings and properties in Merrimac are only a part of the 1,919,198 properties and 32,260 homes for sale in Massachusetts. Because of this, the average home price and average home value of Merrimac also influence the average home price $526,120 and average sale price $448,817 of Massachusetts. Listing counts, Merrimac home prices and home values in Merrimac are sourced daily from listing and property data on realtor.com®, which is the most up-to-date and accurate aggregation of real estate listings in the industry and includes approximately 800 regional MLSs and is the official website of the National Association of Realtors®.
